reviews.text: We've thought about coming here for a while now, and we're glad we stopped by the other night for supper. The upstairs seating was full, so we had to go downstairs to the family area (also other seating areas down there but not quite as nice as upstairs eating areas). It may be a good idea to make a reservation to get certain seating within the restaurant. The service was great and we really enjoyed our meals and dessert. It has a pretty big and diverse menu to choose from, so it shouldn't be hard to find something for all tastes.

Good atmosphere, clean and well designed.Menu was fool of choices , food was served quickly, waiters was bit shy . In general good place to have lunch and dinner with family and friends , I will defiantly go back , the price was reasonable .

Very tasty food. Prices are average. The presentation is beautiful. Served very kindly. Told how to download the discount card. Really great place, I think I will come to eat there again when I am in Riga

What a pleasant surprise that we stumbled into this relatively new restaurant near our hotel.

The menu was very interesting with a mixture sushi and European dishes.  The roast pork with mushroom sauce was delicious.

The ambiance was great although the seating was somewhat odd for its low height. Prices were good plus an enjoyable evening.
Reasonable prices compared to other restaurants in Riga. Service was good, food - tasty!
